title: C++ Language developed at _________?
answer_1: AT & T's Bell Laboratories of USA in 1972
answer_4: AT & T's Bell Laboratories of USA in 1979
right_answer: AT & T's Bell Laboratories of USA in 1979

title: Which one of the following is a keyword?
____ is the smallest individual unit in a program.
Which of the following is the correct syntax of including a user defined header files in C++?
Which of the following is a correct identifier in C++?
Which of the following is called address operator?
C++ is _______ type of programming language.?
Which of the following is used for comments in C++?
What are the actual parameters in C++?
answer_1: Parameters with which functions are called
answer_2: Parameters which are used in the definition of a function
answer_3: Variables other than passed parameters in a function
answer_4: Variables that are never used in the function
right_answer: Parameters with which functions are called
